ISRAEL'S SCHOOL SYSTEM.--TO LEARN THE PLAN OF ANCIENT ISRAEL READ DEUTERONOMY 6:7-10 WHERE INSTRUCTION IS GIVEN ON THE HOME SCHOOL. ALL THE TEACHERS OF THE SECONDARY AND HIGHER SCHOOLS WERE TO 


                       -35- 

BE LEVITES, AND WERE PAID FROM THE TITHES. TO SHOW THAT THEY HAD A SCHOOL IN EVERY CHURCH, READ 2 CHRONICLES 17:7-9.
